Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Kanerva
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights ate marriott berlin hotel located walking distace eg brandenburg gate checkpoint charlie etc ubahn stations outside hotel personal hotel world nice clean floor ceiling windows lots storage space safe hair dryer ironing facilities etc unfortunately internet connection included price sound proofing excellent stayed near elevator afraid absolutely disturbances rate didnt include breakfast 34 cafes nearby stay

Reviews.Title: “Really great hotel and good lcoation”
Reviews.Author: Olideacon
Reviews.Content: booked priceline price hotel hotel nice 5 stars throughout except bedroom bed bathroom amazing rest standard motel suggest 4 star issue else spot service excellent concierge helpful ladies reception brilliant local information restaurant recommendations hotspot knowledge base nights berlin top metro station close brandenburg gate recommended priceline price
